showerReviews.reviewText: 2 stars because of parking, but I advise you not to pay $17.08 for a shower. Unless you like an extremely cold shower in a bathroom with the temperature set at 79¬∞.  This was at 11:30 pm 7/28/25. When I told the young man working he went ‚Ä¶

Had to wait an hour for a shower. All three showers became available at the same time.  The shower was dirty, they do not move anything they just clean around. Cannot see clearly in all photos floor is dirty, wall has black stuff growing on ‚Ä¶
Love this TA!! No wait time for a shower and they finally have one of these new amazing coffee machines that I love !!

Looks nice inside.  But employees standing around. Not working!  I went in to get a shower. Paid, and waited for my turn.  Two showers opened. And after 20 minutes no one came to clean them. When I first walked in the cashiers were ‚Ä¶

This ta express is ok limited parking and food is out ragously expensive but not a bad fuel stop. update will treat you like a criminal for trying to use a shower credit. I'm platinum I've spent over a million dollars at this location over ‚Ä¶

Rude! RUDE!  I was hoping for a shower and a warm meal and was greeted with complete rudeness! After standing in line and waiting for two customers I was told I needed to move to the next line to purchase a shower. I mentioned to the clerk ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ She was unprofessional and rude. Rolling her eyes like I‚Äôm taking her precious time to scan my TA card for shower. I was just not going to her low hood level to argue. ‚Ä¶

Nice little fuel stop. Discount diesel. Caribou Coffee, Pizza Hut & Subway along with their own deli items. Free coffee and shower with minimum diesel purchase.
Only down side is they are extremely busy so line waits can be a bit long.
I was assigned 2 dirty showers & the 3rd shower didn't have enough water pressure to take a shower!!! What a dump!!
Very good place to stop for diesel and shower. New fuel pumps and best price in Nort Dakota.

showerReviews.reviewText:
Support local! Clean, friendly, hot, fresh food and plenty of parking. I'd stay here any time!
Edit: bought a shower based on other reviews, spotless and smells clean as can be!

‚Ä¶ days of bad weather, and it was a very fortunate place to get stuck. Restrooms always clean and well stocked. Shower was spacious, clean, and water ran hot. All the usual snacks, and the selection of hot food was nice. The wings were ‚Ä¶
Friendly service. Super clean shower.

No towels for shower! Ladies at the counter looked so busy at 6 in the morning when it was literally no one in there. One stopped halfway when I was purchasing the shower like she really needs to go somewhere and asked her co worker to ‚Ä¶

Were to start u have to clean ur own shower even after they do and even then the dirt only comes off of one surface layer at a time. Soap was left in the shower and the shower curtain looked like it had never been cleaned. I felt cleaner ‚Ä¶
Realy dirty shower and restroom.s

showerReviews.reviewText: Great place to stop for food, shower, laundry and more!
Waited over 30 minutes for a shower. All doors open no one cleaning them. Should not be selling showers without someone to clean them.
Shower's were very clean i wish every pilot was like this!! The place maintenance is a outstanding never seen a truck stop so clean. Thank you
Diesel fuel lanes were clean, restrooms clean, shower was clean hot water and well ventilated

Awesome food, staff are all very friendly. The shower guy freaking awesome and friendly as well. Thank you all very much!
I spent my 34 reset here.

Traveled a lot, but first time I visited Pilot there was no soap in either the shower or over the sink and not a single towel. Thank you that at least toilet paper and water with light were) In the general toilet is dirty and scattered ‚Ä¶

The manager of this location didn‚Äôt let me shower. I made a reservation on my app I walked in. She said well you weren‚Äôt here waiting. It doesn‚Äôt matter. I was waiting outside in my truck. Is that OK? She was very rude. Very unprofessional. ‚Ä¶

One of the few places where a truck driver can get a hot shower and have plenty of hooks to hang your towels. Also a nice bench to set your clothes on away from the shower stall. Showers wre clean and the hot water didn't go from hot to ‚Ä¶
Clean inside, clean üßº shower üöø, clean restroom, friendly personal. Good truckstop. ‚Ä¶

With the shower that was in this place. I was really very impressed. Because there was  towel everything was clean, there was a soap. Everything clean there is nothing to say even a mint candy. Thank you so much that I found a place like ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Good sized parking lot, 3 semi pumps, 2 one sided diesel island pumps, 6 gas pumps, good food, decent restroom. 1 shower. Decent selection of goods. BIG ENOUGH PARKING FOR TURBINE BLADES!

‚Ä¶ place to stop and grab a bite to eat. Gas is 20 cents more than valley city but in a pinch its a life saver. Excellent for truckers in need of shower. All in all i give it 4 out of 5 stars. The only draw back is sometimes you get a new ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ employees are friendly and will help you if you have a question. Not a typical truckstop, one shower and not open 24 hours but they do have an outhouse in the lot for overnight bathroom needs. Try their scotcharoos, they are great. 5 stars.
Very spacious for trucks with alot of parking. Clean showers and friendly people. Not 24 hrs but all the worth going here. $8 a shower. Good place.
Not bad for middle of nowhere. Have a restaurant open from 6 a.m to 2 p.m . Decent store. Only gave 4 star cause they only have one shower so you have to wait a while if you need one.
Staff was friendly and helpful. Restaurant had closed in the afternoon, couldn't get dinner.  Restrooms and shower were clean along with the store.
Small truck stop, no scale, 1 shower, small restaraunt large parking lot. Open 5am to 12am
Very friendly staff nice clean shower

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ very nice, but workers at the cash register are not the nicest. I bought over 50 gallons of fuel but hadn‚Äôt set up my ultra one points pin yet and was rejected a shower. Ended up paying the $16 even though I just fueled and the shower ‚Ä¶
Forget something in the shower very important for me Lary and Josef help me find it Thanks a lot

‚Ä¶ Restaurant inside.....BEST steak (ribeye) that I've had in a long time! Ordered  before shower and it was ready when I got out. AWESOME. Nice showers, steak,potato and salad for 17 bucks... so tender I could cut with a plastic  knife!! Gue ‚Ä¶

Well don't expect a shower because the night shift says they might or might not have hot water and they're full of attitude. Was gonna eat at the restaurant but my question is how can the employees properly sanitize their hands and dishes ‚Ä¶

The kiosk is still broken as of 02/22/21, so if you need to redeem points, check your account, or need a shower, good luck. I hope you have the app. Speaking of which, I tried using the app while inside the store, I got a msg that said, "no ‚Ä¶

Cant even get a free shower when u purchase 50 gal  of fuel anymore unless u have a " card". Bunch of crap. But u can fill out all your life history and personal info on their computer and get a card. No thanks i dont need anymore people to ‚Ä¶
Love this TA....girls are always cleaning especially in the shower area. Everyone is friendly...Stop here once a week, fueling showing and laundry and to see the friendly staff.
Had a great shower, but would have enjoyed my visit more if they had a couch to sit on.

showerReviews.reviewText: A place that openly allows overnight car parking for up to 36 hours, a great easy on/off the highway location to rest for the night. Restrooms are located just inside the front doors, it has normal convenience store items, and a full service 24 hours/day restaurant inside as well. 5 üåü!! ‚Ä¶

Easy parking, and 24 hour sit down dinner. This establishment truly understands the needs of travelers.  The facilities are impeccably maintained and offer a welcome respite from the road.  The staff provides friendly and efficient service, ‚Ä¶

Clean showers water very hotü•µüî•
Hot coffee
Big parking lot dirt lot and paved lot ‚Ä¶

This gem is located in the heart of farm country! Plenty of car/truck/RV parking. Busy with locals and travelers, it stays quiet. Subway, Rolling Hills Restaurant and Pizza. Hot showers. Staff was friendly all the way around. "Be a Beacon of light so others can find their way. Safe and happy travels!" Be'Be'

One of the best flying j been to in while
Showers were actually  clean
The Rolling Hills restaurant connected to the place is well worth eating at ‚Ä¶

Pretty nice for being way out in the middle of nowhere.  Plenty of gas station and convenience store Items as well as showers, laundry and lounge for truckers.  Has a restaurant, pizza place and Subway.   Car and truck fueling and a truck scale
Stopped in while getting my car washed/cleaned. A nice assortment of items. The gentleman at checkout was very upbeat. Great customer service.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ here as to the other big three in town.  Food line isn‚Äôt the biggest but is adequate.  They are part of the FlyingJ/Pilot rewards so you shower credits are good here.  I used shower 5.  Little compact in there and floor looks like it was ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ down junk and dropped trailers. Literally 10 open spots at 1430 on a weekday. They‚Äôre part of the Pilot/J Franchise (one9), but do not honor shower credits from Pilot/J. Very pathetic food choices available. I‚Äôll use their parking lot, but ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ But the shower had no ventilation and by time you get out of the shower you need another one from sweating to death bc it's so hot from the steam of your shower.  I had to open the door and let the heat out so I could breathe. ‚Ä¶

Although a clean facility, be prepared to pay $15 for a shower. They refused to honor the 9 shower credits shown available on my Pilot/Flying J loyalty card. (I guess I need to stick to actual Pilot/Flying J travel centers in the future)

The shower water kept alternating from hot to cold, on its own, no matter how I adjusted it. Also, I just went in to get my scale tickets and was told by the guy at the counter, "I don't have time to look for it. You will have to come back ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ staff here! Friendly and professional. The showers are excellent,  hot water to spare and awesome water pressure. We want to thank Bobbie for how clean the shower was she was just a great lady and we enjoyed talking with her. Missy, the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ booked a shower. 2 people ahead in line. waited 40 minutes. line didn't change. went to have a look. 4 shower rooms open after use, no one cleans them for 40 minutes. pilot is the company that has never respected the time of a truck driver! ‚Ä¶
Ridiculous how they can just close down showers because they are ‚Äúunderstaffed ‚Äú ‚Ä¶

Don't take a shower at night; you'll wait longer. Almost an hour still waiting, just one clean shower can't make it. After 2 hours waiting, they will cancel your booking for the shower. If I can give zero stars, I will (updated)
Very clean both showed and rest room, it was nice of the one of the workers asking how was the shower.easy parking no fighting a lot of parking space even after hrs ...
all time late bullshit this pilot truck stop staff very lazy they shower not clean on time i booked shower 1 hours before but anyone did not clean the shower all is empty

I don't s write this. But this place are without control. I pay for shower,and no soap or towel. plus Subway r closed more the times. I buy a dinner plate in fuel counter and this was old food. I asking lady there and she said was a less at ‚Ä¶

Probably one of the last Pilot Flying J‚Äôs in the nation where you can shower without being infested with mold attacks and can also get a hot meal off the HOT bar with a plentiful selection instead of a few stale chicken tenders and a soggy ‚Ä¶

Staff was kind and cheerful. Shower was clean, and had great temps. I do wish it had better pressure but it wasn't terrible. The WiFi needs work. Idk if that's even possible up here but, if I'm paying for premium I should be able to use it ‚Ä¶
Don‚Äôt count on a shower when the store is completely empty in the middle of the night.  First excuse: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm covering for someone‚Äù ‚Ä¶
